survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness with hybrid meeting tools used within the organization.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in hybrid meetings (combining in-person and remote attendees)?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in hybrid meetings (combining in-person and remote attendees)?

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
